entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding multiple polylines to a Map messes up existing polyline #22510
  • I can't create maui apps #22509
  • [Android] CarouselView behaves strangely when swiping vertically in view #22507

Closed

  • [Windows] FlexLayout crashes when using a custom display scale factor value (regression) #22209
    .NET 8 SR6

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    community ✨

Merged

  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex

Updated

  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general
